titles.title: I'm Going To Keep On Singing Till He Comes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to keep on singing till He comes, till He comes.
There's nothing in this world worth turning around to see.
My eyes are on that prize that awaits me by and by.
I'm going to keep on singing till He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's word to be preached and souls to be reached.
There's hungry to be fed, little children to be led.
There are things to be done, and battles to be won.
I'm going to keep on singing till He comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's seed to be sown, and grace to be shown.
Captives to set free, and blind eyes made to see.
A race to be run, and battles to be won.
I'm going to keep on singing till He comes.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'm going to keep on loving, etc.
I'm going to keep on trusting, etc.
I'm going to keep on believing, etc.
I'm going to keep on dying, etc.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Voy a seguir cantando
Hasta que venga El
No hay nada en este mundo
Que valga la pena mirar
Mis ojos están en la meta
Que pronto alcanzaré
Voy a seguir cantando y le veré.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Hay palabra para predicar
Y almas para salvar
Hambrientos para alimentar
Y niños para guiar
Hay cargas para llevar
Y coros para cantar
Voy a seguir cantando y le veré

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Hay semilla para sembrar
Y gracia para mostrar,
Cautivos para librar
Ojos ciegos para sanar
Una carrera para ganar
Y batallas para luchar
Voy a seguir cantando y le veré.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Voy a seguir amando….
Voy a seguir confiando….
Voy a seguir creyendo….
